extension.title: Warning system
extension.description: Advance warning system based on points and rules.
extension.author: om

hooks.hook: $mod_om_warnings = $moderator == '1' && isset($_POST['mod_om_warnings']) && $_POST['mod_om_warnings'] == '1' ? '1' : '0';
$query['INSERT'] .= ', g_mod_om_warnings'; $query['VALUES'] .= ', '.$mod_om_warnings;
$query['SET'] .= ', g_mod_om_warnings='.$mod_om_warnings;
// allow user to see his warnings require $ext_info['path'] . '/profile.php';
$query['SELECT'] .= ', u.om_warnings_restrictions';
